mapper.select: SELECT a.*, s.sem_name FROM account a RIGHT JOIN sem_date s ON a.date BETWEEN s.start_date AND s.end_date WHERE s.sem_name=#{sem_name};
mapper.update: UPDATE account SET club_id = #{club_id}, price = #{price}, total = #{total}, remark = #{remark}, file_id = #{file_id}, account_type = #{account_type}, date = #{date} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT account(club_id, price, total, remark, file_id, account_type, date) VALUES (#{club_id}, #{price}, #{total}, #{remark}, #{file_id}, #{account_type}, #{date})
mapper.select: SELECT sum(a.price) FROM account a RIGHT JOIN sem_date s on a.date between s.start_date and s.end_date where s.sem_name=#{sem_name} and club_id=#{club_id};
